label: uncl2155
comment: Code specifying a type of a charge period.

values.label: Per day
values.comment: The associated charge applies to each day the service is provided.

values.label: Per week
values.comment: The associated charge applies to each week the service is provided.

values.label: Per month
values.comment: The associated charge applies to each month the service is provided.

values.label: Per rental
values.comment: The associated charge applies to the entire length of time the service is provided.

values.label: Per hour
values.comment: The associated charge applies to each hour the service is provided.

values.label: Per minute
values.comment: The associated charge applies to each minute the service is provided.
